ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.fragments

Class ThreadViewFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.fragments.ThreadViewFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, UpdateDialogListenerInterface

    public class ThreadViewFragment
extends Fragment
implements UpdateDialogListenerInterface
    Fragment which displays the contents of a ThreadComment and performs all actions on the objects in that ThreadComment.
    Author:
    Henry Pabst, Artem Chikin

      • onResume

        public void onResume()
        Initializes the variables used in displaying the contents of a thread. If the user just returned from selecting a custom location to sort by, it sorts the comments accordingly and resets locSortFlag.
        Overrides:
        onResume in class Fragment

      • setLocationField

        public void setLocationField(View view,
                    Comment comment)
        When comment is selected, additional information is displayed in the form of location coordinates and action buttons. This method sets that location field TextView in the view.
        Parameters:
        view - The View of the Comment that was selected.
        comment - The Comment itself that was selected by the user.

      • favouriteAComment

        public void favouriteAComment(Comment comment)
        Called when the star button is pressed on the selected comment. Save the comment as favourite.
        Parameters:
        comment - The Comment to be added to favourites.

      • unfavouriteAComment

        public void unfavouriteAComment(String id)
        Called when the star button is pressed in the selected comment when comment is already starred. Remove the comment as favourite.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Comment to be removed from favourites.

      • replyToComment

        public void replyToComment(Comment comment,
                  int threadIndex)
        Set up and launch the postCommentFragment when the user wishes to reply to a comment. The fragment takes as input the index of the thread and the comment object to reply to.
        Parameters:
        comment - The Comment being replied to.
        threadIndex - The index of the ThreadComment where the reply is taking place.

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item)
        Determines which sorting option the user selected and sorts the comments accordingly.
        Overrides:
        onOptionsItemSelected in class Fragment
        Parameters:
        item - The MenuItem that was selected by the user.

      • reload

        public void reload()
        Starts a new thread of execution for retrieving Comments from ElasticSearch.
        Specified by:
        reload in interface UpdateDialogListenerInterface

      • finishReload

        public void finishReload()
        On finishing pullToRefresh reload, notify the adapter.
